name: Disable-LocationTracking
commandPattern: New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\LocationAndSensors' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\LocationAndSensors' -Name 'DisableLocation' -Type DWord -Value 1; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\LocationAndSensors' -Name 'DisableLocationScripting' -Type DWord -Value 1; New-Item -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Sensor\Overrides\{BFA794E4-F964-4FDB-90F6-51056BFE4B44}' -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Sensor\Overrides\{BFA794E4-F964-4FDB-90F6-51056BFE4B44}' -Name 'SensorPermissionState' -Type DWord -Value 0
